section.37: Chapters on the description of the Day of Judgement, Ar-Riqaq, and Al-Wara'

hadiths.text: Abdullah bin Mas'ud narrated that the Messenger of Allah (s.a.w) said:"Shall I not inform you of whom the Fire is unlawful and he is unlawful for the Fire? Every person who is near (to people), amicable, and easy (to deal with)
